text: man-yag geudaedeul-i bulsinjadeul-egelo gabeolin baeujadeul-ui ilbuleul ilh-eossdamyeon geudaedeul-eun (yejeon-e) jeonlipum-eul eod-eossdoda. geuleoni baeujaga tteonan geudeul-ege geudeul-i (gyeolhon-eul wihae) sseun jaesangwa yusahan geos-eul doedollyeo jula. geuligo geudaedeul-eun geudaedeul-i midneun hananim-eul gyeong-oehala
